remarks: Relation by a binary relation abstraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
brabg2.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
brabg2.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
brabg2.3 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | ph } $.
brabg2.4 $e |- ( ch -> A e. C ) $.
brabg2 $p |- ( B e. D -> ( A R B <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x y $.
